sentences.en: An inconspicuous urban underclass lives in squalor.
sentences.cn: 在这个肮脏破败的地方居住着不为人注意的城市下层阶级.

sentences.en: an urban underclass, who have limited access to health care
sentences.cn: 不能充分享受医疗服务的城市贫困阶层

sentences.en: However, it's common that some boys regard nothing and ask underclass student to come with them.
sentences.cn: 然而, 如果这些男孩子们不顾一切,要邀请低年级的同学这种现象也是很常见的.

sentences.en: Poverty and prejudice afflict Europe's Romanies particularly, but the underclass has other members too.
sentences.cn: 贫穷和偏见对欧洲罗姆人的影响尤为深刻, 但是下层阶级还有其他成员.

sentences.en: The basic problems of the inner-city underclass are inadequate housing and lack of jobs.
sentences.cn: 老城区底层人群面临的基本问题是住房紧张和就业不足。

sentences.en: The creation of a new underclass in China and its implications.
sentences.cn: 中国新的下层阶级的产生和它的含意.

sentences.en: The Es are the underclass and thus usually left out of the picture.
sentences.cn: E级的人属于最下层,一般就都被人们所忽略了.

sentences.en: The long-term unemployed are becoming a new underclass.
sentences.cn: 长期失业的人正形成新的贫困阶层。

sentences.en: They are the underclass and thus usually left out of the picture.
sentences.cn: 他们属于最下层,一般就都被人们所忽略了.

words.tran_cn: 下层阶级，下层社会；一、二年级学生

trans.tran_cn: 下层社会，下层阶级，社会低层，一、二年级学生
trans.tran_en: the lowest social class, consisting of people who are very poor and who are not likely to be able to improve their situation
